Release Date: December 15, 2012
Runtime: 124 min.
Genre: Drama / Fantasy / Adventure
Language: Japanese
Subtitles: English Softsubbed

Plot

Bem (Kazuya Kamenashi), Bela (Anne Watanabe) and Belo (Fuku Suzuki) are 
humanoid monsters. They disguise themselves as a human family, but their 
appearance transforms into monsters when they get extremely angry or sad.
